div.pre: 2085 Avola, 20 km. SW of Syracuse, 1891 (100) Burial: 450-440 B.C. (Jenkins); c. 435 (K) Contents: c. 2000 A. In bronze vase Acragas: tetradr. (eagle/crab) didr. (a few) Gela: tetradr.; 3 didr. Leontini: tetradr. (Apollo hd., a few) Syracuse: 1 decadr. (reported, but Orsi doubts) tetradr. (to Boehringer 631, no sphendoné types) 1 didr. (as Boehringer 497) Disposition: Syracuse 21 (all Syracuse) Orsi, NSc 1891, pp. 345-7 (c. 400 seen) Currò Pisanò, AIIN 1962-4, pp. 221, 236 Jenkins, Gela, pp. 147-8
